interestingcomments.content:
Canon connect as GPS /!/ Can someone explain the functionality of the app for geotag?

I directed the camera to use the phone as GPS device, and indeed I see location in  my files.

But I want to understand the options in the app

I see two switches but adding geotag to app works even if both are off

1. Begin logging
2. Send location when  connect to Wifi

And also button to send log to camera although I get a message my camera do not support this option.

So what's the switches for?

interestingcomments.content: Is there a better app to use than the canon camera connect on android? /!/ I constantly have problems with it and it's really frustrating. Is there a better app I could use?
